BASIC
public class BASIC extends Object
This class is written Kaan Tandogan and JDK21 is used.

    • menu

      public void menu()
      Shows the menu and provides user with some options.

    • createDate

      public Date createDate()
      This method creates a Date. There are a lot of things to consider when creating a date. For example user should enter 3 "/" operators. If more or less entered the method should warn the user. It checks if the dates and the months are making sense. For example, a user shouldn't be able to enter 14th month. Or 37th day.
      Returns:
      to_return Returns the date it has created.

    • addUser

      public void addUser(int id_to_add)
      This method checks whether or not the id given by the user already exists in the arraylist and if exists it gives warning, for a new user a new id is required. While writing this code I thought the user must enter a name and surname under all circumstances but date of birth shouldn't be mandatory. So I provide the user with option of passing the date of birth if s/he wishes to do so.
      Parameters:
      id_to_add - .This parameter is the id that I want to create a user with.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(int target_id)
      This method checks whether the user with the given id exists in the arraylist or not. If the user doesn't exist, it gives warning and if exists it removes him/her
      Parameters:
      target_id - this parameter is used for finding the target.

    • getUserDetails

      public void getUserDetails(int id_to_search)
      After traversing the arraylist if the user exists this method publishes the details of that user. If the user doesn't exist in the list, this method gives a warning.
      Parameters:
      id_to_search - this parameter is used for searching the user.

    • addProperty

      public void addProperty()
      The addProperty method creates a property. As understandable, all properties should have and host. And therefore this method first checks whether the host with the given id exists or not. If the host with the id doesn't exist it asks the user whether it wants to check for another id or it wants to create a new user with the ID s/he specified. After these steps it starts to create a new property. User has to enter a price for day for it is necessary for our future calculations. But other than that, this method provides user with some sort of options on which property constructor the user wants to use.

    • deleteProperty

      public void deleteProperty(int id_to_del)
      In the deleteProperty we do get a id to delete integer from the user. After that, we are checking if the Property with the given id exists. If the id doesn't exist, we are giving a warning to the user about the issue. And if the id exists we are deleting it. You can check the code more in detail.
      Parameters:
      id_to_del - With the id_to_del parameter we are searching the property.

    • getProperyDetails

      public void getProperyDetails(int prop_id)
      This method publishes the property details if the property with the specified if exists. If the property doesn't exist the method gives warning.
      Parameters:
      prop_id - This parameter is used for searching the property.

    • addBooking

      public void addBooking(int user_id, int property_id)
      This function allows the user of the application to add booking to a specific user to a specific property. Because of the different booking constructors this method is able to provide user with some decision-making. Takes user id and takes property id. Controls their existence and gives warning in case of an error. And creates a booking if there are no problems.
      Parameters:
      user_id - This is user id parameter which is necessary for checking the existence of the user.
      property_id - This is property id parameter which is necessary for checking the existence of the property.

    • getUserBooking

      public void getUserBooking(int user_id)
      If the user exists this method shows all of its bookings and if the user doesn't exist it gives an error message.
      Parameters:
      user_id - This is user_id parameter, an integer, used for checking the existence of a given user.

    • getBookingCost

      public void getBookingCost(int userId, int propertyId)
      This method gets the users id and a property id, and if the user made any booking on that property it gives the total booking cost.
      Parameters:
      userId - The userId is used for checking the existence of the user.
      propertyId - The propertyId is used for checking the existence of the property. Checks whether the user exists or not and if exists checks for the existence of the property. If the property isn't found it gives a warning and if the property is found it calculates the cost with the help of totalCost method, which is a method of the User class, and adds the costs. If there is more than one booking on a given property it adds all of them.

    • listUser

      public void listUser()
      This method shows all the active users ,if a user is deleted it doesn't show.

    • listProperties

      public void listProperties()
      Shows all the active properties, if a property is deleted it doesn't show.

    • exit

      public void exit()
      Tells Goodbye as all good programs should do ...
